long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real-Time Monitoring of Non-Financial Risks for Your Business

Riskify is designed to help businesses and professionals quickly identify and assess Non-Financial Risks directly from their browser. Ideal for risk managers, compliance officers, and business leaders, Riskify provides AI-powered insights into operational risk, capital markets, reputational risk, cybersecurity risk, employees risk, compliance risk, and ESG risk.

Install the Riskify extension to access comprehensive risk reports by visiting a company’s LinkedIn profile. The extension uses AI to analyze risks in real-time, offering you instant insights without disrupting your workflow.

➤ With the Riskify Chrome Extension you can:
⭐️ Access Risk Reports Instantly: Evaluate operational, reputational, and compliance risks with a click.
⭐️ Real-Time Insights: Gain insights into operational, cybersecurity and ESG risks directly from LinkedIn.
⭐️ AI-Enhanced Due Diligence: Use intelligent data to assess potential partners, competitors, or investment targets, simplifying your research and assessment process.

➤ Target Users:
👤 Financial institutions and banks
👤 Procurement departments
👤 Company management and board members
👤 Investors and shareholders
👤 Risk management and compliance teams

➤ Use Cases and Methods:
💡 Browse LinkedIn: Instantly view the non-financial risk profile of companies with AI-supported assessments.
💡 Research Competitors: Assess the operational and reputational risks associated with competitors.
💡 Due Diligence: Conduct thorough Non-Financial Risk assessments when considering new partnerships.

➤ Types of Risks Covered:
📌 Operational Risk: Assess the resilience of your target companies by monitoring their preparedness for natural disasters and the impact of crises and wars on operations.
📌 Capital Markets Risk: Assess the overall stability of your target companies by monitoring key indicators like stock market performance, investment activities, acquisitions, and funding.
📌 Reputational Risk: Stay ahead of reputational threats by tracking the public perception and ethical practices of your target companies. 
📌 Cybersecurity Risk: Stay vigilant against cyber threats by continuously overseeing the cybersecurity posture of your target companies.
📌 Employees Risk: Evaluate the workforce stability of your target companies by monitoring key indicators like employee turnover and labor practices. 
📌 Compliance Risk: Ensure your target companies adhere to industry regulations and standards, especially in ESG and cybersecurity.
📌 ESG Risk: Track the environmental, social, and governance (ESG) practices of your target companies.


➤ How to Use Riskify:
🔸 Install the Extension: Download from the Chrome Web Store.
🔸 Open LinkedIn Profile: Visit the LinkedIn page of the target company.
🔸 View Risk Reports: Access AI-powered risk data instantly.
